ValidationRule.description: If this DashboardTarget will not auto-update the Object and WHERE fields must be blank.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT(Auto_Update__c) && OR( NOT(ISBLANK( SOQL_WHERE_clause__c )), NOT(ISBLANK( Object_API_Name__c )) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If this DashboardTarget will not auto-update leave the Object API Name and SOQL WHERE clause fields blank.
